RJ that is a great idea, just please do this for the right reason.
If you a=
re enthusiastic about this, we need other ideas........
Just remember to be=
 respectful of other researchers . Everyone is just
trying to 
come up with=
 ideas . Understanding is what we all want.
Positivity is a good thing. Don=
't make it personal.... : )
Thanks for helping.
 
Deb

____________________=
____________

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=
] On Behalf
Of Rj
Sent: Tuesday, December 30, 2008 11:16 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Raw files from plane crash ITC sessions=




I am going to conduct a little experiment, if you all don't mind.
I wil=
l give these instructions to several people.  I encourage those
here to try=
 it too.

Listen to the 3rd video on that page. 
http://www.youtube.com/wat=
ch?v=3D8nm3EhR9PTc&eurl=3Dhttp://www.ufogeek.com/v
ftse.htm

Listen especia=
lly from 4:00 to 4:10
But do not go past 4:10, because then he says what he=
 thinks it is
saying.

Tell me what you think, if anything, the words in 4:=
00-4:10 are saying,
before you have gone past 4:10 and heard what the perso=
n on the audio
then says he thinks he hears.



--- On Tue, 12/30/08, Rj <r=
asterer@...> wrote:



	From: Rj <rasterer@...>
	Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] Raw files from plane crash ITC sessions
	To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om
	Date: Tuesday, December 30, 2008, 8:09 AM
	
	

	
Thanks for posting.   =
 I am going through them now.

Could you explain more what you meant when y=
ou said you ran the audio
file through an algorithm that adds vocal-chord- =
like sounds?  To what
software/function do you refer that adds those?



--=
- On Tue, 12/30/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@ yahoo.com>
wrote:
=



	From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@ yahoo.com>
	Subject: [EVP-IT=
C] Raw files from plane crash ITC sessions
	To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
	D=
ate: Tuesday, December 30, 2008, 6:54 AM
	
	

	Greetings fellow researchers=
,
	
	In my continuing quest to openly share what I do, I've completed

	upl=
oading 36 files from the numerous ITC sessions I performed
durng my 
	plane=
 crash paranormal investigation. (Raw files and processed
files)
	If you're=
 interested in hearing or experimenting with any of the
files, 
	please be =
my guest. They are located at the following link, at
the top 
	of the page:=

	
	http://www.ufogeek. com/vftse. htm
<http://www.ufogeek.com/vftse.htm> 
=
	
	Also on that page are the videos of what I did. The Youtube
multiple 
	s=
egments are listed in order, first... and the entire 43 minute
video 
	is a=
t the bottom.
	
	Thanks... and have a great day!
	- Mike C. (UFO Geek)
	htt=
p://www.ufogeek. com <http://www.ufogeek.com>
